dialogue.text: Welcome to Adventura 360. A virtual tour inside the Cavite State University Indang Campus.
We are here today inside the campus and I will be your tour guide!
Well...
Our campus is quite big. So this tour will might take a while.
Right now, we're at the front of gate 1 in the campus.
You can roam around as you please, but if you need me, just click on the Tour Guide button on the upper left below the minimap.
So shall we start the tour?
This is the International House 2 or IH2
The first building we'll see near the Gate 1 of the campus.
This building serves as a dormitory for students who are far away from the campus.
This building also houses book store and other school services. If you're looking to buy books you can check out this building.
Welcome to Department of Information Technology or in short DIT.
As a Computer Science student, this is where our department is located.
Welcome to the College of Sport and Physical Education and Recreation or in short CSPEAR.
This place also serves as the gymnasium of the university.
Fitness subject, are usually held here or in the oval.
This is the Offeice of Student Affairs and Services or in short OSAS.
This is where Registrar, Guidance, and other student services are located.
If you're incoming freshmen and is interested in applying to the university, this is where you should go.
This building is what we call Bahay ng Alumni.
This is where guests, visitors or alumni who want to stay at the university. Consider this as a university motel.
This a research facility called National Coffee Research, Development and Extension Center
The name suggest that this is where the university researches about coffee.
Welcome to the College of Economics, Management and Development Studies Building or CEMDS for short.
There are two main building of CEMDS in the campus. This is the new one.
The old one is near the Department of Physical Sciences Building
Welcome to the College of Agriculture, Forestry, Environment and Natural Resources or CAFENR for short.
This is the main college building for CAFENR. Where it has a great Tamaraw statue in front of it.
This is the Research Center
Considered as one of the School Facilities of the university.
This is where college students approach and ask for permision to use school's laboratories to conduct their research.
This is the Ladislao N. Diwa Memorial Library or the university library.
The building is consist of 6 Floors. You can try to enter the library and explore the floors.
Fun fact: behind this building there is a Museum of the university and beside the library is the Coffee Shop called "Science Cafe"
This is the International House 1 or the IH1.
This building provides services similar to IH2 but also houses school facilities
This is where the residents of Hostel Tropicana temporarily resides and some facilities of College of Medicine can be located
The Institutional Development Office or IDO is also located here.
This is the Department of Biological Sciences or BioSci for short.
The department building under College of Arts and Sciences.
This building contains classrooms and facilities for students. Usually Micro Biology students resides here.
Welcome to the College of Nursing or CON in short
This is the main building of CON.
Do not be confused College of Nursing with the College of Medicine. They are different.
This is the Coffee Processing Center.
I guess they process coffee here?
Welcome to Department of Industrial Engineering and Technology or DIET in short.
The DIET building is under College of Engineering and Information Technology.
Welcome to Department of Computer and Electronics Engineering or or DCEE in short.
The DCEE building is under College of Engineering and Information Technology.
Welcome to the College of Engineering and Information Technologyor CEIT in short.
This is the main building of CEIT. This building is where offices related to CEIT are located.
This is the Administration Building.
This is the building where administration offices are located. This is also where Public Affairs Communication Office is located.
At the back of this building the University Cashier can be found.
This is the University Cashier.
This is where students process their fees and payments.
Welcome to the College of Arts and Sciences or CAS in short.
This is the main building of the College of Arts and Sciences.
This is the Department of Physical Science or PhySci in short.
There is a debate whether it's pronounced "Fee-Sci" or is it "Pie-Sci" .
Welcome to College of Economics, Management and Development Studies Old Building or CEMDS Old Building.
This is the old building of CEMDS, but it's still being used by students and faculties as their classrooms.
This venue is called Rolle Hall.
The Rolle Hall is a venue for events and activities of the university or can be rent by outside parties.
Welcome to College of Veterinary Medicine and Biomedical Sciences or CVMBS in short.
This is the main building of CVMBS.
This building is a Hospital but for animals.
This building is also a part of CVMBS where they practice and treat animals.
This building is the Department of Animal Science.
This building is under CVMBS.
This is building is the University Infirmary.
The students who are processing their application are required to undertake medical examination by the University and are usually sent perform their examination here.
This is the Internation Convention Center or ICON.
This is the main venue where the University held their events and activities such as Job Fairs, Graduation Ceremonies, and other events.
Entrance examination are usually held here.
Welcome to the College of Education
This is the main building of College of Education
This is the Cavite Science Highschool Building
The university also offers highschool education and this is where the highschool students are located.
Ahead is the section of Agri Eco Tourism Park.
The Agri Eco Tourism Park highlights the calming nature surrounding the university. It is a place where students can relax and enjoy the nature.
The place also serves as attraction for visitors and guests.
I highly recommend you to visit this place in person if you have the chance.
Welcome to the College of Justice and Criminology or CCJ in short.
This is the main building of CCJ. A building where future law enforcers are trained.
This building is Home Economic Vocational and Technical Education Department
The building is under College of Education or CED.
Welcome to the Historical and Cultural Museum or University Museum.
This building is where cultural and historical artifacts of the university are displayed.
There are lots of historical artifacts can be found inside along with Paintings, Sculptures, and other artworks.
Welcome to Adventura 360. A virtual tour inside the Cavite State University Indang Campus.
